Posts.Content: Hi Lorna...i was 24 when i was first diagnosed with Breast Cancer 20 years ago.....2 years ago i was diagnosed with stage 1B1 Cervical Cancer & in March this year i was diagnosed with Stage 1 Breast Cancer again....33 is young,but the sad thing about cancer is,it doesn't take age into consideration when it invades our bodies.You sound like a very strong & positive girl,if you ever feel like a chat or a good old rant,please dont hesitate in messaging me....Wishing you luck on your journey! Nikki x x
Posts.Title: To young for breast cancer????

Posts.Content: Hi Anne,i am also waiting for a nipple reconstruction and augmentation to my right breast to match my reconstruction.....if you have yours before me,i'd love to know how it went...and if i have mine before you,i will willingly share my story. nikki x
Posts.Title: Nipple Reconstruction????
